title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 473-2.2 - Definitions. (Rule 22.2)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 473-2.2 - Definitions. (Rule 22.2)

State Regulations

As used in this Subpart (Rule 22), the following terms are
defined as follows: (a) Agency
means the police force or police department of any
county, city, town, or village, or a county Sheriff. (b) Municipal Gun Buyback

Fund
means the fund established pursuant to section 97-cc of the New

York State Finance Law that is held in the joint custody of the State

Comptroller and the Commission of Tax and Finance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
473-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
